short_summary: Supplementary bid solicitation that provides clarification and answers to questions from potential suppliers regarding the Supply Arrangement E60HS-18AGTR.
description: The Government of Canada seeks the procurement of agricultural tractors and related items...
full_summary:
===============

**Tender Announcement for Agricultural Tractor**
-----------------------------------------------

**Reference Number**: cb-152-87214594

**Solicitation Number**: W8476-246808/A

**Publication Date**: January 25, 2024

**Closing Date**: February 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Modification Number**: 3

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals from pre-qualified suppliers for the supply of agricultural tractors and related items. The solicitation is issued in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HS-18AGTR.

**Contract Description**
------------------------

The Department of National Defence requires the supply of seven (7) agricultural tractors and related items, including spare parts and accessories. The requested delivery date is 180 days after receipt of order.

**Pre-Qualification and Selection Criteria**
-----------------------------------------

Only suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A are eligible to participate in this bidding process. Pre-qualification for a SA can be obtained through the following link: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-645-75635.

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on lowest price.

**Tendering Method**
-------------------

The tendering method for this solicitation is competitive selective tendering.

**Background and Supporting Documents**
----------------------------------------

For complete details regarding this solicitation, please refer to the solicitation document W8476-246808/A.

**Contact and Queries**
----------------------

For any queries or questions regarding this solicitation, please contact:

Dong Le
Department of National Defence
Phone: (999) 999-9999
Email: dong.le@forces.gc.ca

**Language**
------------

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note to Supplier: All bidders are expected to familiarize themselves with the solicitation and supporting documents before making a submission. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
